```{r}
n = 10000
X = cbind(rnorm(n), rnorm(n), rnorm(n),  rnorm(n),  rnorm(n),  rnorm(n))
colnames(X) = 1:ncol(X)

Y = rowSums(X)^2 
data =cbind(Y,X)
colnames(data) = c("y", colnames(X))
```


```{r}
t = proc.time()
form = formula_hal("y ~  .^2", smoothness_orders = 1, data, bins = 100, screen_cor_pval = 0.1)
form
#fit <- fit_hal(form)
proc.time() - t

```
